document_data.name: Tanglethorn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tanglethorn''' tribe was an [[orc]]ish tribe that inhabited the [[High Forest]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Homeland: The orcs lived in small villages and underground tunnels in the High Forest, located around two days' journey from the forest's edge.
document_data.Customs: Like many of the [[High Forest orc]] tribes, the Horned Lord tribe worshiped [[Herne|Herne the Wild Hunter]].
document_data.Abilities: The members of this tribe possessed many of the forestry skills typical of [[ranger]]s.
document_data.Relationships: The members of this tribe were often at odds with [[human]], [[elf]], and [[half-elf]] rangers.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1222}}, the Tanglethorn and [[Horned Lord tribe|Horned Lord]] tribes gathered in the [[Blackhorn Horde]] and overran the settlement of Lord [[Ornigar Tchazzam]] in [[Starshadow Vale]]. This was to avenge the plundering of the orcish burial mounds in the vale.
